div.h2: Claim HHA Low Utilization Payment Adjustment (LUPA) Indicator Code

div.p: The code used to identify those Home Health PPS claims that have 4 visits or less in a 60-day episode. If an HHA provides 4 visits or less, they will be reimbursed based on a national standardized per visit rate instead of Home Health resource groups (HHRGs). Source: https://bluebutton.cms.gov/resources/variables/clmhhalupaindcd
This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

name.value: Claim HHA Low Utilization Payment Adjustment (LUPA) Indicator Code

description.value: The code used to identify those Home Health PPS claims that have 4 visits or less in a 60-day episode. If an HHA provides 4 visits or less, they will be reimbursed based on a national standardized per visit rate instead of Home Health resource groups (HHRGs). Source: https://bluebutton.cms.gov/resources/variables/clm_hha_lupa_ind_cd
